item.content:encoded:
Tarot & Oracle Decks of the Week

On Sale

10th May - 17th May

3 stunning decks on sale this week.

﻿

The Linstrider Tarot , a stunning deck is spun with soft strokes of vibrant colour featuring gentle yet evocative images that dance on the edge between magic and logic.This captivating art will enhance your readings in powerful and profound ways.


Star Dragons Oracle,  33 stunning cards invite you to call upon energies embodied by constellations and fabled Dragons alike, welcoming that power into your life, so to help you obliterate obstacles, cross the finish line, obtain the answers to your deepest questions, find your strength, transverse a mighty trail, tell your story and banish illusionary concepts of weakness forevermore.


The Wild Unknown Archetypes, takes seekers on a journey of self-discovery deep into the collective unconscious and through the realm of archetypes, where dreams and myths meet. 78 gorgeous circular oracle cards divided into four suits: The Selves, The Places, The Tools, and The Initiations. Each archetype has been carefully selected for its symbolic potency and the lesson at the core of its nature. A beautiful and inclusive tool for self-exploration or for practicioners to work with clients.

Linestrider Tarot

WAS $52.99

NOW $45.00

Star Dragons Oracle

WAS $34.99

NOW $30.00

The Wild Unknown Archetypes

WAS $69.99

NOW $55.00

Tarot and Oracle Decks are a beautiful way to

 * Develop/Enhace your intuition

 * Support you through transitions

 * Find meaning, clarity and purpose


Used daily or in your Self-love & Self-care practices they can be a valuable tool you personally and professionally.

The detailed written descriptions of the cards can trigger a knowing or resonate,offering clarity and insights.


Symbolism is the language of the universe and I find the image symbolism on the cards provide deeper perspectives and guidance for your experience, combined with your beautiful intuition the cards inspire movement and bring forth the messages for your highest good.


The Merkabah

Soul Reading Expression Sessions with me are availble to book through the website

I offer a Personalalised Shopping Service to connect you with a Tarot or Oracle Deck aligned with your higher self.

﻿

Vibe High my Tribe

Love & Blessings Helen xxx

item.title: Crystal of the Month Agate
item.description: Agate keeps the soul from harm, known as 'The Stone of Longevity' it is the perfect crystal of the month for May energies.
item.content:encoded:
Agate Crystal of the Month

On Sale May


'The Power of Longevity'


20% Off all Agate Crystals

Offer Ends 31st May 2022

Welcome to May, the month of Agate


Energetically May is a big month, Mercury Retrograde on the 10th & a Full Blood Moon Luna Eclipse in Scorpio on the 16th (Partially visible in Australia), its going to shake you up to process what no longer serves your divine highest good so you can move towards aligning with your true soul purpose.


Also Venus meets Chiron 'Wounded Healer, among all the other planetary influences & solar storms which will have a definate impact on our frequency, making Agate my crystal for the May madness. It could be an emotional rollercoaster so buckle up & enjoy the ride.



All Agates are grounding stones, balancing & stabilising the emotional, physical & mental bodies. Agate eliminates & transforms negative energy with its powerful cleansing effect on the physical & emotional levels.



Specific colours & types hold additional properties which may be of assistance to your specific needs this month! Transmuting the negative planetary energy influences & using their alignments in a positive way is key to healing & shifting consciousness.


Agates beautiful gentle energy will support your process through any transitions Scorpio Moon, Mercury Retrogade & the Shitshow throws your way!


If you feel you need support & guidance through these energies book a

Session With Me


Agate

Agate's supportive energy keeps the soul from harm.

'It's power lies in it's ability to transmute dark, toxic emotions such as jealousy, bitterness & resentment. It stimulates the courage to start again' [Judy Hall]

Agate stabilises the Aura, balances Yin/Yang, Masculine/Feminine energy.

It is a slow working stone of strength creating a sense of safety & security dissolving any internal tension. Perfect for any kind of emotional trauma.

Agate raises consciousness, linking into the collective unity consciusness, it encourages contemplation & assimulation of life experiences for spiritual growth & inner stability. It encourages one to speak their own truth.


Pair up with Clear Quartz to stimulate memories.


'Placed on the Heart, aids in healing the emotional dis-ease that prevents the acceptance of love.

Placed on the abdomen or taken as an elixar, it stimulates the digestive process & relieves gastritis.

It heals the eyes, stomach & uterus, it cleanses the lymphatic system & the pancreas, it strengthens blood vessels & heals skin disorders.' [Judy Hall]



Keywords:


*Forgiveness *Cleansing *Wealth *Health *Longevity * Stability to the physical body & Aura * Emotional Healing * Strengthens Mental Concentration * Transmutes Toxic Emotions * Encourages Self Acceptance * Self-Confidence * Masculine/Feminine Harmonisation * Grounding


FREQUENCY: Earthly

CHAKRA: Base

ZODIAC: Scorpio

ELEMENT: Earth

NUMBER: 7


Blue Lace Agate

‘The Power of Communication’

Blue Lace Agate connects spirit with intellect. Highlighting integrity, it enhances the ability to communicate effectively what is in your mind and heart, to voice your most profound personal & spiritual truths. [101 Power Crystals, Judy Hall]

It can help you reach extremely high spiritual spaces. Containing the qualities of air, movement & grace. It is a highly inspirational influence when used for inner attunement.Blue Lace Agate activates the corresponding chakras & helps you enter into high-frequency states of awareness.  [Melody]


Keywords:


* Communication * Regeneration * Rebirth * Inner peace * Relaxation *Clarity * Truth * Trust * Unity * Cleansing * Smooth energy flow & free expression * Psychosomatic healing of dis-ease


FREQUENCY:  Earthy, Medium to High

CHAKRA:  Throat, Third Eye, Heart, Crown

ZODIAC:  Gemini, Pisces

SOUL PATH:  Expressing yourself fully

ELEMENT:  Water

NUMBER:  5

Crazy Lace Agate

'The Stone of Laughter'

Crazy lace Agate encourages you to live in the present moment and find joy in life, and to approach your spiritual path with optimism. Enhancing self confidence, self worth and self acceptance this stone with its crazy patterning gently supports inner stability & brings forth hidden knowledge.


Keywords:


* Happiness * Abundance * Present Moment * Stabilises & Strengthens * Harmonises Yin & Yang Energy * Balances emotional, physical mental energy * Promotes fun and laughter * Encourages self esteem, security & confidence


FREQUENCY:  Earthy

CHAKRA:  Solar Plexus

ZODIAC:  Libra, Gemini, Pisces, Virgo

ELEMENT:  Earth

NUMBER:  9


Fire Agate

Fire Agate representing the spiritual flame of perfection is a grounded earthy vibe. Believed to contain the essence of the element fire with its reddish, orange browns & flashes of gold Fire Agate has traditionally been used in alchemy for centuries.


Keywords:


* Physical energy * Vitality & protection * Integrity * Divine Blueprint * Passion * Love * Stabilising * Strengthening * Life Force * Sexuality * Creativity  * Base Chakra & Lower Chakras* Life Purpose * Spiritual Growth & Inner Stability * Transformation & Re-Birth.



FREQUENCY:  Earthy with a lower intensity, vibrates slower than other stones.

CHAKRA:  Base, Sacral, Solar Plexus

ZODIAC:  No traditional Zodiac however it does connect well with Aries, Leo, and Sagittarius being fire signs also with Gemini & Scorpio.

SOUL PATH:  Evolution of Consciousness

ELEMENT:  Fire

NUMBER:  9

Red Agate

Red Agate is a warrior stone with a powerful fire element enhancing physical energy, vitality & protection, strengthening your confidence to pursue your purpose.


Keywords:


*Grounding *Clears & Aligns Lower Chakras *Reignites Passion *Strength *Focus *Determination *Calm *Expression*Self Acceptance *Empowering

*Accomplish Goals


FREQUENCY:  Earthy

CHAKRA:  Earth Star, Base, Sacral

ZODIAC:  Libra, Gemini, Sagittarius, Aries

ELEMENT:  Fire

Dendritic Agate

'The Stone of Plentitude'

It is excellent stone for the nervous system and will aid the ascension process, stimulating/balancing the base chakra and balancing/supporting the crown chakra.

Agate raises awareness and links into the collective consciousness of the oneness of life. It encourages quiet contemplation of one’s life experiences that lead to spiritual growth and inner stability.   [Hall, 39][Melody, 82]

Dendritic Agate encourages the acceptance of one’s origin and the connection to the natural states of the universe. It is a stone to help heal the Earth and to stimulate a peacefulness within the structure of the inner environment.  [Melody, 86]


Keywords:

 

* Inner stability * Protection * Abundance * Strengthens family connections * Supports self analysis * Promotes self acceptance & speaking ones truth* Stability * Composure * Plant Kingdom connection * Assists in overcoming emotional boundary violations * Aids healing the pain of an unhappy childhood * It is useful for any kind of trauma.


Agate Crystal of the Month

On Sale  May

20% Off ALL Agate Crystals!


The Merkabah

item.title: Healing With Crystals
item.description: A list of crystals for specific Physical, Psychological, Emotional & Spiritual issues & ailments.
item.content:encoded:
Crystals forHealing

Many crystals/stones have multiple uses or purposes. There are crystals for physical, mental, emotional, spiritual, and general life issues in this list. Crystals have been used in ancient/traditional healing to assist with one’s wellbeing.


“Crystals are known to be transformers of energy. They can stabilise & balance & harmonise energies. Everything is energy, thus the crystals can focus healing energy & set the intention for healing.” Remi


I personally now prefer to connect with crystals without knowing their metaphysical properties until after, as sometimes our ego can get in the way of what our energy is in tune with. However, I also acknowledge that it is also helpful at times to have a list, as below to help align a crystal for a specific purpose.


This list is far from complete. The work of Judy Hall, Melody & Remi has been used to complile the list.


Medical Disclaimer : Crystal properties are listed for information purposes only and are not intended to replace professional medical treatment. Although the powers of crystals & stones are well documented they are never a substitute for medical advice. Always consult a qualified medical professional for medical treatment. Terms of Use>>

A

item.title: The Importance of your Base Chakra & Grounding
item.description: Supporting, Grounding, Healing, Balancing the Base Chakra through the ascension process
item.content:encoded:
I Am Grounded, Safe & Connected

The Importance of our Base Chakra

‘The Base Chakra is about accepting the energy of the earth and the energy of life. It is where we put down our grounding wire into the Earths Telluric Energy. This is a natural function of our energetic body; it is what keeps us alive and in the present moment.


“It is the domain of the Earth, of concentration or density, of matter, of the archetypal mother, of your own mother, of blood, of linage and of your genealogical tree. It is also the domain of all materialisation and security: your home, your money and your own physical and material security. All the problems that you encounter related to these themes undermine the expression of the Base Chakra”


‘Our strength, vitality & endurance depends on the quality of our connection to the Earth and on the emanation & opening of the Base Chakra.’ [Regina Martino]


Avoiding or neglecting Base Chakra issues often lead to a focus on being in the higher Chakras, to escape/avoid the material/physical world by being more in the ‘light’, in higher vibes, out in the cosmos chillaxing. By doing this we are neglecting and abandoning our incarnation and our physical body resulting in poor grounding. Lacking good strong grounding increases the risk of becoming a sponge to various influences & low vibes. It creates fears and this in turn reduces our energetic field & our vibe. Earth energy is crucial for energetic balance and is often forgotten in the ‘Flight to the light’.


‘Harmony is found in the 2 polarities; Yin &Yang, Ba & Ka, Light & Darkness, Masculine & Feminine, Higher & Lower, the material & the subtle. A balanced alignment is consciousness’ [Regina Martino]


The Matrix can be extremely difficult to navigate through the ascension process, you are simultaneously clearing karmic, ancestral & galactic timelines whilst downloading, upgrading & navigating the voids! Grounding in new energies & downloads is essential not only to integrate the information coming in but to avoid a Spiritual Crisis!  


Signs of the Base Chakra Imbalanced


  • Ungrounded
  • Unclear of Purpose
  • Fearful
  • Insecure
  • Confused
  • Impatience
  • Fear of alienation
  • Death wish
  • Angry/violent
  • Over-sexed or impotent
  • Vengeful
  • Impulsive
  • Manipulative
  • Hyperactive – Kids fall into this category as they are up in the higher Chakras with overstimulation & overuse of modern technologies – TV, devices and Gaming. They lack grounding and the knowledge and mentors to teach them.
  • Regina Martino believes that ‘their 6th Chakra(third eye) is greatly overdeveloped to the detriment of the 1st (base)& 7th (crown) Chakras (representing the mother & the father respectively),
Signs of the Base Chakra in Balance

  • Grounded
  • Secure
  • Safe
  • Content
  • Sense of one’s personal power
  • Active
  • Independent


Base Chakra Support

Grounding


  • Walking Meditations/Earthing – shoes off walking on the earth mindfully feeling the soles of your feet touching the ground with every step. Grounding or Earthing is when we mindfully connect to the natural energies of the Earth by walking barefoot, laying/sitting on the ground, swimming.
  • Reconnect with your physical body using practices such as yoga, massage, and physical activity.
  • Visualizations – E.g. Imagine tree roots penetrating deep into the Earth’s core and anchoring around a crystal in the Earth’s centre, feeling safe and secure. Send Mother Earth love from your heart and allow her energy to rise up through your feet and legs filling the Base Chakra.
  • Notice quickly the first five things you can; see, hear, feel, taste, & smell. This brings you into the present. It takes you out of your head & into your body.
  • Gardening – get out in the dirt it’s that simple.
  • Eat earthy foods – Red meat, Root vegetables, Nuts & Seeds
  • Connect with Crystals - in particular Shungite as it helps regain your bio-energetic balance.(see below)
  • Essential Oils (see below)
  • Inner work on Base Chakra Issues is essential


Energetic Healing 


Energy healing can help clear stuck/blocked energy as well as some unwanted clingon’s which interfere with the flow of energy in the base chakra affecting its function.

We are conditioned to believe that the supernatural simply doesn’t exist. I have had a knowing that there is more ‘out there’ from a young age. I’m a Scorpio and all things Life, Death, Rebirth intrigue me. Just because it isn't always seen, it doesn’t mean it’s not there. 


It is always wonderful to have someone facilitate you on the journey – I know without my posse of Healers/Holistic Counsellors/Shamans, I wouldn’t be here today!

A healer is someone that triggers within you your ability to heal yourself. As a Transpersonal Counsellor I have a wonderful tool box of processes to offer my clients.


Be wary of whom you let in your energy field though, make sure you trust them 100%, is their energy clear, what measures do they take to keep their energy clean. Always use your own intuition to guide you and always take responsibility for your own healing journey.


A good healer will be teaching you tools and techniques which you can implement for yourself, rather than ‘fixing’ you or give you the answers.


Sometimes it is very necessary to have a dependence on ‘outside’ healers/mentors because we need the support & guidance until we can develop the skillset to be more supportive of ourselves. Over time you will notice more independence and you will be less likely to be reliant of their skills, as your own spiritual boundaries & stamina develops.


Healers also need healing and energy clearing so don’t think that we are immune. We are all on our Soul Journey & Ascending. The Shadow Side doesn't stop just because you've hit a certain level of consciousness. 


>>Click here if you would like to work with me or find out more

Crystals for the Base Chakra


All the stones which are said to be protective stones in crystal healing increase the concentration of the vital field and activate the base chakra. This gives a greater resistance to outside disturbances and increases our ability to recover from illness or emotional shocks. 
That is why they are referred to as being ‘protective stones’ however simply using a stone without consciously working on balancing, grounding and improving our connection to our body & Earth will be a band aid solution.

They are used for support whilst regaining balance and for innate protection rather than a weapon against attacks from outside yourself.

Crystals are a great support for your healing journey and each have unique properties & specific purposes for each individual.


There are many more crystals which align with the Base Chakra – too many to list! 

 Always use Crystals which you resonate with.


BLACK OBSIDIAN, GALENA, BLACK TOURMALINE, LABRADORITE, TURRITELLA, AGATE, BLACK TEKTITE, SPECTROLITE, IRON JASPER, MORION QUARTZ, CERUSSITE, ANGLESITE 
These all vibrate with the lower part of the body mainly the feet. These are best used for crystal healing or meditations that are for accessing deeply buried or blocked information. They aren’t really recommended for daily practice around life and vitality.


SILICIFIED WOOD, CHIASTOLITE, CRYSTALLINE HEMATITE, MAGNETITE, GRAPHITE
These stones are more aligned with the Chakra outside of the body between the knees. They are great stones for deep inner work & family lineage.


RED JASPER, GARNET, FLINT, BLACK ONYX, JET, SMOKEY QUARTZ, SHUNGITE

These stones directly vibe to the Base Chakra and are easier to carry or wear on the body regularly to increase vitality, strength and grounding.


SHUNGITE is the shit when it comes to the Base Chakra


‘From a vibratory point of view Shungite resonates with the frequency of the Base Chakra’s red colour, with the subtle frequency black in its link to the density of the Earth, and with the subtle frequency magenta of the Magenta Chakra – this Chakra is found about 30cm above the top of the head. These 3 frequencies engender a particular energetic movement that is very fine and at the same time very powerful. The highest frequency present in Shungite (the Magenta frequency) is likely present in the fullerene molecules. Contact with the magenta frequency allows us to be connected to the movement of life while contact with the other frequencies (red & black) is connected to the structure and the basis of life. Because of these 3 frequencies, we can say that with Shungite connects us to our energy of life.’ [Regina Martino is a Geobiologist & Bioenergy expert specialising in Crystals.]


Shungite stimulates the base chakra, stabilises the energetic body and therefore safely opens the door to explore the higher Chakras. Shungite significantly expands the vital field & the Base Chakra, whilst also increasing emanation of all chakras, restoring alignment. Something not found in the other stones, making it a standout choice.


Crystals are available at The Merkabah & the majority are physically hand selected, Shungite is the excepton as it is 100% Authentic Shungite direct from the Russian Mine.

Essential Oils

Essential oils have the highest frequencies of any measured natural substance. 

You can diffuse, simply smell, cook with or apply to the skin with a carrier oil to stimulate, balance, calm, transform, rejuvinate & support your Base Chakra naturally.

Essential Oils associated with the Base Chakra;


  • Black Pepper
  • Ceaderwood
  • Patchouli
  • Frankincense
  • Ginger
  • Myrrh
  • Rosewood
  • Rosemary
  • Sandlewood
  • Thyme
  • Vetiver
  • Ylang Ylang

The Merkabah stocks a small range of essential Oils & I place an order with DoTerra every month on the 13th if you would like to order anything or would like more info please Contact Me

 It is important to use only therapeutic grade essential oils.

So that’s the low down on the Base Chakra & grounding in the energies to shift the paradigm. Remember in the ‘Flight to the light’ & playing in the realms, with the beings, the ancestors, spirit guides, downloads, light code activations and much more, requires you to ground the energies.

The truth is, if you’re not firmly grounded with a strong connection to earth you are leaving yourself wide open, then how do you know what you are connecting to. Spiritual Self Care is just as important as all other forms of Self Care.


We all learn from those that have gone before us, the passing on of wisdom & knowledge, some things resonate & some don’t & sometimes it can take awhile to get the AHA moment. It just depends on our resistance and readiness. I learn more and more everyday and have had some amazing people come into my life just at the ‘right’ time. Take what resonates, leave what doesn't.



Vibe High my Tribe

﻿

item.title: Shungite, Shielding Stone for the Shitshow
item.content:encoded:
Shungite

THE POWER OF SHIELD

  Scientifically proven to reduce the effects of EMF's

NATURES PROTECTION FOR THE ENERGETIC SHITSHOW  

'The Stone of Life'

We are currently living in what I like to call an energetic shitshow , multitudes of frequencies coming at us from all directions, some positive. some negative. Given we are vibrational beings, these frequencies both natural, man made & otherworldly influence our energetic fields, constantly messing with our vibe. We are in a galactic battle with the Reptillians, Greys & a few other low vibe sketchy ass species, plus we've somewhat normalised EMF's (electromagnetic Fields) - Power Lines, Cell Phones, Computers, Wi-Fi, Microwaves & other electrical appliances. For most of us they have become essential in our daily living. Although scientists are apparently in disagreement as to whether or not they are a carcinogen to humans, the effects they have on our DNA & our wellbeing, most of us know that any disruption to the natural flow of energy impacts on the wellbeing of all living things & we are no exception.


Some possible physical symptoms we may experience from being exposed to EMF's are;

  • Sleep Disturbances, including insomnia
  • Fatigue, Tiredness
  • Headache
  • Dysesthesia (itchy sensation)
  • Lack of Concentration
  • Dizziness
  • Irritability
  • Depressive Symptons/depression
  • Anxety or Restlesness
  • Nausea
  • Tingling/Burning Skin
  • Changes in Memory
  • Gernerally feeling like shit


Supporting, Shielding, Protecting ourselves has never been more essential given the energetic shitshow we are evolving beyond. 

It's part of our Self- Care & our Spiritual Self-Care.


So, why is Shungite my Stone of choice for the Shitshow!?

Well it's been scientifically proven (for the sceptics & the non-metaphysical believers) to reduce the effects of harmful EMF's but metaphysically it is an amazing, unique stone. Here's why & further down how you can learn how to use Shungite to shield, protect and re-balance your beautiful soul. your home, your workspace & products available.


Shungite is a rare black stone found only in the Karelia region, beside Lake Onega, in Russia. It is thought to be at least 2 billion years old. The deposit is over nine thousand square km.

Two schools of thought as to its origin;

1. It was formed here on Earth

2. It's a giant meteorite

They (being geobioligsts/scientists and peeps that specialise in dating stuff) havent yet agreed....


Shungite consists of almost all the minerals on the periodic table and has a very unique composition. It contains fullerines which are 3-D sperical molecules made of 60 carbon atoms, these are called buckyballs and are the reason Shungite is a Master Healer.


‘From a vibratory point of view Shungite resonates with the frequency of the base chakra’s red colour, with the subtle frequency black in its link to the density of the Earth, and with the subtle frequency magenta of the magenta chakra – this chakra is found about 30cm above the top of the head. These 3 frequencies engender a particular energetic movement that is very fine and at the same time very powerful.

The highest frequency present in Shungite (the magenta frequency) is likely present in the fullerene molecules. Contact with the magenta frequency allows us to be connected to the movement of life while contact with the other frequencies (red & black) is connected to the structure and the basis of life. Because of these 3 frequencies, we can say that with Shungite connects us to our energy of life .’   [Regina Martino Geobiologist & Bioenergy expert specialising in Crystals]


Shungite  stimulates the base chakra, stabilises the energetic body and therefore safely opens the door to explore the higher chakras. Shungite significantly expands the vital field & the base chakra, whilst also increasing emanation of all chakras, restoring alignment.


A few other benefits of Shungite


  • Shields Electromagnetic Field Emissions (EMF'S)
  • Relieves Stress
  • Purifies water
  • Kills Bacteria & Viruses
  • Reduces Oxidative Stress
  • Reduces Inflammation
  • Eases Physical Ailments
  • Relieves Stress & Depression


Shungite Vibes: Earthy & High


How does it work?

As I said, Shungite has scientifically been proven to reduce the harmful effects of EMF’s when placed near the electromagnetic sources. It modifies the influence of electromagnetic radiation, absorbing and neutralizing, restoring balance. It does not interfere with the functioning of equipment, for example, it doesn’t turn off the pulse waves emitted by a Wi-Fi transmitter, cordless phone or cell phone, it instead transforms the influence of harmful radiation, helping prevent its impact on our health, It is more efficient in doing so because it does not become saturated like other stones and doesn't take on a negative charge.



Electro-magnetic frequency (EMF) vulnerability is a major issue as most people are exposed to the effects of the EMF due to the fact that in today’s modernised world we are surrounded by electronic devices; Mobile Phones, Microwaves, Tablets, Computers, Laptops, Wi-Fi, Cordless Phones, Electrical appliances & Panels, Electricity lines, Towers etc. Electromagnetic radiation has harmful effects on humans, we are vibrating beings and it disrupts our natural frequency because we absorb EMF’s.



Geobiology

Bioenergetic equaibrium is no longer maintained in our current world as the ancestral knowledge buildings were once based on is ignored, lost or hidden. The earth is an intricate energy system & consits of duality as does all things.  There are zones where the natural energy of Earth is disturbed by weak electro-magnetic frequency(EMF) created by underground streams, certain mineral concentrations and fault lines and cavities. The wave lengths of the disturbed natural radiation can seriously affect our health.


George Lakhovsky in the 1930s suggested that geopathic stress can cause the human body to vibrate at much higher frequencies than normal, affecting the immune system, he believed people sleeping/working in locations geopathically stressed are more susceptible to viruses, bacteria, parasites, and environmental pollution.


Ernst Hartmann published a book titled Illnesses as a Problem of Location. Later,K. Bahler listed the signs indicating that a person’s sleeping place was located within a geopathic stress included antipathy to one’s bed, difficulty falling asleep (for hours), bad sleep, anxiousness, fatigue and feeling tired in the morning after waking up, bad mood, nervousness, depression, rapid heartbeat, and leg cramps. According to Bahler, children might also feel fear, scream in their sleep, grind their teeth, feel chilly while in bed, want to leave their bed, and lose appetite.

While we are asleep our body should be resting so it can repair body cells, fight infections and absorb nutrients from food. However, our body has to use all it’s energy just to keep vital organs going if we sleep in an area affected by geopathic stress.


The most effective option would be to leave the geopathic stress zone, however that is usually not an option in this day and age.


Professional Dowsers can help you find fault lines if you suspect they may be affecting your health and well being – Dowsing is a practice wherein an individual divines the location of water and other objects, usually with dowsing or divining rod/s. This has been a part of human culture since early prehistory.


Using Shungite will greatly decrease the effects of geopathic stress.

How to use Shungite

Body placement

Wearing or carry Shungite on the body.

Pocket Harmonisers

Pendants

Rings

Tumblestones

Shungite is often used to make talismans protecting your energetic field from occult forces and negative energies. Clear, cleanse & set the intention for your stone.

Applying the Shungite to the harmful source using Plates, Pyramids, Spheres & Eggs

CELL PHONES/ TABLETS

Apply a small adhesive disc/plate to the back of the device & wear a pendant to neutralize the effects.


LAPTOPS

Laptops are harmful as the hard drive’s motor and it’s active components radiate negatively. Place a disc anywhere on the computer or beside the keyboard.


WI-FI/MODEMS

In order to transform the radiations from your own Wi-Fi hot spot, transmitter or Modem. Place a plate of Shungite underneath it.

 

CORDLESS PHONES

The base of the cordless phone emits harmful bioenergetic waves that extend out all around it to a distance of about 10m. It is essential to protect the base or choose a non portable phone. Being protected by a Shungite Plate at the base the handsets then automatically balance their transmissions.


ELECTRICAL PANELS

The damaging influence of around 50Hz alternating current emitted by electrical instillations can be corrected by using a Shungite Pyramid on the Power Box.

Studio or small apartment 5cm pyramid

House 7cm pyramid

The larger the electric instillation the larger the pyramid needs to be. 


MICROWAVES

Personally I have not owned a microwave for 10 years. Protecting yourself externally from the unit itself is really pointless. The device destroys and irradiates the food you are ingesting. Consuming microwaved food causes us to lose 40-60% of our life force energy. If it makes you feel better place a Shungite plate on the front of the device.


HIGH–TENSION LINES

The best thing to do would to move elsewhere

Wear a Shungite Pendant

Place a Pyramid or Sphere in each room 6-10 cm this would be the same for neighbouring Wi-Fi emissions.


LIVING ROOMS

Place a large Pyramid 7-10cm  or a Large Sphere 7 -10cm in your living room area to harmonise & create a peaceful sanctuary.


BEDROOMS

A Sphere or Egg will balance and create a peaceful and relaxing energy, whilst eliminating any negative energy within the space.

Harmonisers - Shungite paired with Selenite is a powerful combo which promotes restful sleep, helps with insomnia, nightmares and anxiety. 


FOR CHILDREN

New technologies attract and over stimulate a child’s upper chakras, especially the over use of devices & their games. An over stimulated 6th Chakra can contribute to hyperactivity. The introduction of grounding exercises and Shungite can help balance the chakras.

Wearing a pendant (not every day) & harmonisers in the bedroom – Shungite & Selenite can help them re-balance.


OFFICE

Place a pyramid or sphere on your office desk, size will depend on the area of your desk & available space.

A phone/device holder is excellent for your office or if you sleep with your device on your bedside table this is an effective way to harmonise & reduce the effects of EMF's. Turn your device on its side to insert charger.

SHUNGITE IN THE CAR

The car engine, computer system, electrical system shrink our energy field, we are no longer connected to the Earths energy field. We are stuck in a cage where energy cannot escape or enter.

The effects of long car trips leave us feeling tired and drained.

Place a small shungite pyramid 3-4cm on the dashboard or wear a shungite pendant. 


PLANES

When you exit a plane your 1st Chakra is smaller. wearing Shungite helps withstand the energetic disturbances caused by the cabin pressurization.

When you arrive you need to re-connect with the Earth – Shungite helps reactivate this relationship.


GEOBIOLOGY

To “protect oneself from the effect of geopathic stress, neutralisation of the radiation using shungite “energy pyramids” and other absorbing shungite products is recommended. Place them in your home, workspace or any area you feel is most affected.

Beneficial influence zones for spheres and pyramids placed in a neutral zone

based off the studies by Regina Martino. When they are placed in an area of distrubance the enamation will be reduced in proportion to the intensity of the disturbance.


Shungite is graded in terms of its natural organic carbon content

Type 1 - Elite Shungite 98% Carbon

Type 2 - Shungite (black shungite) 50-70% Carbon

Type 3 - Shungite (grey or shungite rock) up to 50% Carbon but generally around 30% or less.


Fullerines are not abundant in all grades. Elite Shungite has the highest content and is rare. I only stock Type 1 & 2.


Whilst the benefits of Shungite have only recently been acknowledged by the Western world & the scientific discovery of fullerines present in Shungite, it is important to remember the people of Karelia, Russia have known & recognised the benefits of Shungite for centuries, without even knowing what fullerines were!

This mineral formed billions of years ago and archeological research shows numerous ancient settlements in this area as early as 9,000 BCE, throughout time civilisations have been leaving behind petroglyphs & rock paintings dating back four thousand to nine thousand years. The rock carvings at Lake Onega date from the Neolithic era depicting mythological scenes, nature, migration patterns & archeological digs have uncovered sacred sites, labyrinths, sacred stones, burial sites, dating to 6000 BCE.

The healing properties of the 'black rock' & pure waters waters which sprang from it, of the Lake Onega area, were offically mentioned in writing in the reign of Ivan the Terrible & his son Feodor in the 1500's.

Shungite has the remakable ability to purify water and more on that will be in another blog.



Shungite is a Master Healer, a wonderful addition to your health & wellbeing regime.


P.S. I personally believe the theory that Shungite formed from a giant meteorite. That meteorite was intentionally thrown on Earth by galactic beings (us) for these very times in our evolution.

item.title: Retuning/Cleansing your Crystals
item.description: When a crystal vibrates with energies that are not quite the same as its natural energy, it moves “out of tune” with the Earth. Crystals that are not tuned to their natural receiving frequency are not going to be able to vibe well. In order to return them to their natural resonant frequency, they need to be re-tuned. This is where the concept of “cleanse” comes from.
item.content:encoded:
What is Crystal Retuning & Cleansing

I was always taught that crystals are like little sponges which absorb all the yucky energy until they are filled, and release good energy until they run out.

Now I work with the energy of crystals, their vibe, I no longer view them as sponges needing cleansing. Crystals have a continuous, uninterrupted flow of energy to draw upon, as long as they are vibrating at their natural frequency. The energy they receive from an external source, most frequently the Earth is the energy they vibrate/pulse with.  A crystal will naturally vibrate with its particular frequency set that is contained within the rainbow of energy that is the Earth’s light body (its electromagnetic field).


When a crystal vibrates with energies that are not quite the same as its natural energy, it moves “out of tune” with the Earth.

Crystals that are not tuned to their natural receiving frequency are not going to be able to vibe well. In order to return them to their natural resonant frequency, they need to be re-tuned. This is where the concept of “cleanse” comes from.

You may find that if set your intention to retuning your crystal it will rapidly respond.


As they sit in your home they are influenced by everything going on in your area & alignment with their natural vibration is easily influenced, regardless of how high your cosmic ass is vibing. Regularly retuning your precious crystals, especially before & after you use them ensures they are exuding their correct healing vibes for you to fully receive their positive benefits.


How to Retune your Crystals

Energetically connecting to the infinite source of Cosmic Energy & Mother Earth is a fast and effective way to re-tune your crystal.

  • Choose a quite space either inside or outside.
  • Ground yourself, put in your spiritual protection & set your intention to clear & cleanse your crystal/s, connect to source energy. This is where you can bring in your own spiritual practices.
  • Find two dents/holes in the crystal, if there are none then choose two places which feel right.
  • Place index finger and middle finger on the holes/dents
  • Place your thumb either on the earth or on a piece of wood. The two fingers are positive & negative and the thumb is grounding to the earth.
  • Ground it and hold for 1 – 1 ½ minutes with the intention of taking out all recordings & negative influences. Erase everything for the highest good of all, transforming the energy sending it diectly to source to be processed & align the crystal to it's original frequency, connecting it to the earth & source energy, pure unconditional love.
  • Close the space with love & gratitude


Traditional Approaches to Cleansing & Re-Charging Crystals

Sound is an efficient tool to use in re-tuning crystals and stones. Sound is a mechanical energy caused by the movement of energy through the air.

You can use drums, singing bowls, gongs, music, solfeggio frequencies or any other loud source of sound. You will be guided to stop when you feel they are clear, because you are in the process. 

Place crystals in Sunlight on the Earth with the intention of re-aligning to their natural vibration.

Some crystals are a little sensitive to light, indirect sunlight is sufficient. Be mindful clear quartz can ignite & cause fires so it is best out of direct sunlight. Some crystals may fade or become brittle.


Bury crystals in the Earth. Check in with your crystals intuitively as to how long to bury them for. It might be 1 day or 2 weeks.


Polished crystals have undergone lapidary processes and certain polishing powders & compounds are used & may cause discolouration & damage to the surface of the crystals. Use caution with salt water & burying in soils with these crystals so you do not damage them.


Some people like to place their crystals under the full moon.

Place on the Earth overnight under the full moon with the intention to re-tune to its natural vibe.

Smudge Shop Here>>


Using other crystals such as;


Selenite or Shungite Charging Plates

Place the crystals on the charging plates & leave for 24-48 hours


Place in a bag with Carnelian


Shungite Plates

Carnelian Tumbles


Once your amazing crystals have been retuned they are ready for you to set your intentions and be in service to you!

Would you like a Crystal Reading to find out the top 5 crystals your higher self wants you to work with?

The Merkabah stocks a beautiful range of crystals, Tarot & Oracle Cards, Cleansing & Spiritual Tools to support your soul journey.

Vibe High my Tribe

item.title: How to Work with Crystal Energy
item.description: Everything is energy, so, if there is an energy you would like to bring into your life then there is a crystal for it. Crystals have their own radiating energy, and vibrate at different frequencies depending on their matter, size, thickness & their light frequency (colour). Crystals awaken the potential within, an activating process, and they help us to connect to that aspect within.
item.content:encoded:
Tips on How to Work with Crystal Energy

'Everything is energy & all energy can be transformed'

Raymon Grace



Everything has its own vibration/frequency including humans. We each have a specific overall optimum frequency which we vibe at, then each of our organs & systems, including our energetic systems have their own specific frequency. For example the optimum frequency of our liver is different to our kidney, the same as the heart chakra & our sacral chakra has a different frequency. We are in a constant state of vibration, when we are 'out of balance' it means that we are not vibing at our optimum frequency somewhere within our intricate system. 


Everything is energy, so, if there is an energy you would like to bring into your life then there is a crystal for it.

Crystals have their own radiating energy, and vibrate at different frequencies depending on their matter, size, thickness & their light frequency (colour). Crystals awaken the potential within, an activating process, and they help us to connect to that aspect within.



Find a crystal that has the desired energy & will activate that energy. I often say that a crystal chooses you; this is because you have resonated long before you are even aware. Trust what you are drawn to, the soul knows how to heal itself. Sometimes the reason you are drawn to a certain crystal may not be revealed until you have done some work with it.


Re-Tune, Align & Activate your Crystal before using it.

Read Blog>>

Connecting to a crystal and sensing the energy of a crystal is not done in the head, it is felt, in the emotional space. If you hold a crystal near your body, for example your hand, take notice of how you feel in this moment, become aware of the energy, and as you move the crystal around in front of your hand, you can feel it. This just takes practice, if you are experiencing difficulty there are a few reasons why you may be unable to feel the crystals energy:


• You are in your head – think less, feel more

• You may have a block or resistance to the energy

• It’s a new unfamiliar energy, therefore you do don't know it yet


 I was recently told that if you have a block and cannot feel the energy, then you feel gratitude towards the crystal and it will open you up to the energy. You are then able to connect to its energy and ask ‘what am I feeling?’, then go from there.


If that doesn’t do the trick and you still don’t feel anything, then it may be an unfamiliar energy. Crystals have a range of frequencies, from earthly to exceptionally high. You may not have opened up to this frequency yet and are not conscious of its energy or, you are not vibrating high enough to feel it yet. Use it passively (see below) and work your way through other stones first, then revisit it.


If you choose a crystal and it feels 'too much' and its energy is ovewhelming you may not be ready for that crystal yet, or you may need to support it with other stones. For example Moldavite has an extremely high vibration, some people feel sick & dizzy when they hold it. Using grounding stones such as Shungite or Jet as a support stone may help harmonise the energy & ground the energy into the body easing the intensity. Find a combination which works, otherwise it may just be you havent reached the level energetically to work with that crystal yet and there are others which will be more suited.

Don't give up!


4 Ways to Work with Crystal Energy

Passive – the placement of a crystal in a space/wearing it on the body/under pillow etc, its presence broadcasts its energy simply by being. It is the easiest way to use crystals. However, if you want to clear blockages or activate anything within, it is also the slowest method. It doesn’t mean you are not benefiting from it.


Active – This is where you are consciously connecting to the crystal and focusing your attention onto it, to experience the crystal. This method is useful for meditation as some stones just take you into a meditative state, it can also be used with intention e.g to increase one’s vitality - Carnelian.


Resonating – This is where you can feel the crystals energy and you can send that energy back to it. You are on the same frequency and by surrendering to the energy you will be taken on a journey, (if you allow yourself to let go of reality). With the right crystal Astral Travel, inter-dimensions, connecting with crystal keepers etc will become possible.


Projecting – This is when the crystal energy is flowing freely through you and projecting that energy out through you. Projecting the crystal around you can be transformative, as this is the space where the message of the crystal is. It is the ultimate to get to this stage and is the highest form of crystal work.

In order to ‘get to the next level’ so to speak, you work at the level under it.



‘If you want to find the secrets of the universe, think in terms of energy, frequency & vibration’ Nikola Tesla


Enjoy the process of connecting with crystals & exploring their amazing healing properties.


Vibe High my Tribe

item.title: Activating Your New Crystal
item.description: The very first step you will need to do is clear you precious crystal to erase all energy which it holds that is not of it's origin. The hands & energy it has passed through to reach you needs to be erased of all recordings others have put onto it. This is so you can install your purpose without any residue of old energies which are not yours. While I do this before sending out your crystals its good practice to also do it yourself.
item.content:encoded:
How to Activate your New Crystal

“Crystals are atoms in motion, they are live, this is not some ‘new age’ theory, this I’m told is physics. Their rhythm and motion is so constant that their force field is constant and in balance. Quartz crystals for example have a unique ability to convert electrical energy to mechanical energy and vice versa. This is called the piezoelectric effect. Yes Technical! BUT...

Quartz crystal’s piezoelectric properties became the foundation of post Twentieth Century technological society. Scientists found that the vibration patterns quartz crystals receive and transmit could be manipulated to augment, store, amplify, transfer, transform and focus other vibrational frequencies of energy, including sound, electricity and even information in the form of precise periodic pulses. Sonar, radios, cigarette lighters, transistors, computer chips, liquid crystal displays, digital watches, cars, satellites and many other technological pillars of today’s global society utilise quartz crystals in their manufacture.” Curtis Lang


The very first step you will need to do is clear you precious crystal to erase all energy which it holds that is not of it's origin. The hands & energy it has passed through to reach you needs to be erased of all recordings others have put onto it. This is so you can install your purpose without any residue of old energies which are not yours. While I do this before sending out your crystals its good practice to also do it yourself.


How to Cleanse & Erase your Crystal


This is what I call the Les Brown Method with a lil' bit of Helen


  • Choose a quite space either inside or outside.


  • Ground yourself, put in your spiritual protection & set your intention to clear & cleanse your crystal/s, connect to source energy. This is where you can bring in your own spiritual practices.


  • Find two dents/holes in the crystal, if there are none then choose two places which feel right.


  • Place index finger and middle finger on the holes/dents


  • Place your thumb either on the earth or on a piece of wood. The two fingers are positive & negative and the thumb is grounding to the earth.


  • Ground it and hold for 1 – 1 ½ minutes with the intention of taking out all recordings others have put in. Erase everything for the highest good of all.


  • Align the crystal to it's original frequency & connect it to the earth & source energy, pure unconditional love.


  • Close the space with love & gratitude


How to Align & Activate your Crystal


Aligning to your Crystal


The intention is to ground the crystal, connect it to source energy & align it to you.


  • Choose a quite space either inside or outside.


  • Ground yourself, put in your spiritual protection & set your intention to align & activate your crystal/s, connect to source energy. This is where you can bring in your own spiritual practices.


  • Hold it in both hands, Fill it with LOVE first & foremost, crystals are live, so do this with thought and care. From your heart centre not your head.


  • Connect the crystal the earth & source energy of pure unconditional love then connect it to you.


  • You may wish to say the following or make up your own personalised intention.


"I align [the crystal] to the energy & frequency of Mother Earth & the Universe,  I align with my crystal for my highest good & the highest good of all."


Activating your Crystal


Activating your crystal means setting intentions. What you put in is what you will receive. If you put in positive you will receive positive, if you put in negative you will receive negative.

Everything is energy so set your intention with clarity and alignment to your Soul, for your highest good & the highest good of all.

It is said once you have done this that you can now talk with your crystal. It will give answers, those answers may not be in words (for some it may) the forces inside will answer as it is now aligned with you & your energy. Take note of body reactions in particular, facial expressions etc.Your crystal is not a toy and responds without question, treat it always with the up most respect.


Setting the Intention


Put yourself into it & what you want it to help. Not a story, fill it with instructions; healing, protection, be specific. Fill it with the thoughts that will help you through life & help others.


So if the purpose is for anxiety, fill it with ‘calmness, serenity, ease’ rather than filling it with ‘stop/remove my anxiety’ feel the difference in those statements.

You are ready to start the beautiful journey of working with your crystal!


I prefer people not to touch my crystals as clearing & activating would again be required. They continuously require your attention – the nucleus will have a greater force field with those that regularly use & cleanse their crystals.


Learn How to Re-Tune/Cleanse Crystals after activating Click here>>


You have to put something into your crystals to get something out. Do this with sincerity & heart & your crystals will bring much joy to your life.


There are many ways to cleanse & use crystals, this is how I have been guided to work with crystals & have shared the information. This is intended as a guide & may or may not resonate with you and your beliefs.


Vibe High my Tribe

item.description: Shungite 'The Stone of Life' Shungite is a rare black stone found only in the Karelia region, beside Lake Onega, in Russia. It is thought to be at least 2 billion years old. The deposit is over nine thousand square km. Shungite consists of almost all the minerals on the periodic table and has a very unique composition. item.content:encoded:
Shungite

'The Stone of Life'

Shungite is a rare black stone found only in the Karelia region, beside Lake Onega, in Russia. It is thought to be at least 2 billion years old. The deposit is over nine thousand square km. Shungite consists of almost all the minerals on the periodic table and has a very unique composition. It contains fullerines which are 3-D sperical molecules made of 60 carbon atoms, these are called buckyballs and are the reason Shungite is a Master Healer.


Shungite is graded in terms of its natural organic carbon content

Type 1 - Elite Shungite 98% Carbon

Type 2 - Shungite (black shungite) 50-70% Carbon

Type 3 - Shungite (grey or shungite rock) up to 50% Carbon but generally around 30% or less.


Fullerines are not abundant in all grades. Elite Shungite has the highest content and is rare.


‘From a vibratory point of view Shungite resonates with the frequency of the Base Chakra’s red colour, with the subtle frequency black in its link to the density of the Earth, and with the subtle frequency magenta of the Magenta Chakra – this Chakra is found about 30cm above the top of the head. These 3 frequencies engender a particular energetic movement that is very fine and at the same time very powerful.

The highest frequency present in Shungite (the Magenta frequency) is likely present in the fullerene molecules. Contact with the magenta frequency allows us to be connected to the movement of life while contact with the other frequencies (red & black) is connected to the structure and the basis of life. Because of these 3 frequencies, we can say that with Shungite connects us to our energy of life.’  [Regina Martino Geobiologist & Bioenergy expert specialising in Crystals]


Shungite  stimulates the base chakra, stabilises the energetic body and therefore safely opens the door to explore the higher Chakras. Shungite significantly expands the vital field & the Base Chakra, whilst also increasing emanation of all chakras, restoring alignment.


Benefits of Shungite


* Shields Electromagnetic Field Emissions (EMF'S)

* Relieves Stress

* Purifies water

* Kills Bacteria & Viruses

* Reduces Oxidative Stress

* Reduces Inflammation

* Eases Physical Ailments

* Relieves Stress & Depression


Shungite Vibes: Earthy & High

NATURE’S PROTECTION AGAINST EMF’S

Shungite has scientifically been proven to reduce the harmful effects of EMF’s when placed near the electromagnetic sources. It modifies the influence of electromagnetic radiation, absorbing and neutralizing, restoring balance. It does not interfere with the functioning of equipment, for example, it doesn’t turn off the pulse waves emitted by a Wi-Fi transmitter, cordless phone or cell phone, it instead transforms the influence of harmful radiation, helping prevent its impact on our health, It is more efficient in doing so because it does not become saturated like other stones and doesn't take on a negative charge.



Electro-magnetic frequency (EMF) vulnerability is a major issue as most people are exposed to the effects of the EMF due to the fact that in today’s modernised world we are surrounded by electronic devices; Mobile Phones, Microwaves, Tablets, Computers, Laptops, Wi-Fi, Cordless Phones, Electrical appliances & Panels, Electricity lines, Towers etc. Electromagnetic radiation has harmful effects on humans, we are vibrating beings and it disrupts our natural frequency because we absorb EMF’s. 



Geobiology

Bioenergetic equaibrium is no longer maintained in our current world as the ancestral knowledge buildings were once based on is ignored, lost or hidden. The earth is an intricate energy system & consits of duality as does all things.  There are zones where the natural energy of Earth is disturbed by weak electro-magnetic frequency(EMF) created by underground streams, certain mineral concentrations and fault lines and cavities. The wave lengths of the disturbed natural radiation can seriously affect our health.


George Lakhovsky in the 1930s suggested that geopathic stress can cause the human body to vibrate at much higher frequencies than normal, affecting the immune system, he believed people sleeping/working in locations geopathically stressed are more susceptible to viruses, bacteria, parasites, and environmental pollution.


Ernst Hartmann published a book titled Illnesses as a Problem of Location. Later,K. Bahler listed the signs indicating that a person’s sleeping place was located within a geopathic stress included antipathy to one’s bed, difficulty falling asleep (for hours), bad sleep, anxiousness, fatigue and feeling tired in the morning after waking up, bad mood, nervousness, depression, rapid heartbeat, and leg cramps. According to Bahler, children might also feel fear, scream in their sleep, grind their teeth, feel chilly while in bed, want to leave their bed, and lose appetite.

While we are asleep our body should be resting so it can repair body cells, fight infections and absorb nutrients from food. However, our body has to use all it’s energy just to keep vital organs going if we sleep in an area affected by geopathic stress.


The most effective option would be to leave the geopathic stress zone, however that is usually not an option in this day and age.


Professional Dowsers can help you find fault lines if you suspect they may be affecting your health and well being – Dowsing is a practice wherein an individual divines the location of water and other objects, usually with dowsing or divining rod/s. This has been a part of human culture since early prehistory.


How to use Shungite

Body placement

Wearing or carry Shungite on the body.

Pocket Harmonisers

Pendants

Rings

Tumblestones

﻿

Shungite is used to make talismans protecting your energetic field from occult forces and negative energies.


Applying the Shungite to the harmful source using Plates, Pyramids, Spheres & Eggs

CELL PHONES/ TABLETS

Apply a small adhesive disc/plate to the back of the device & wear a pendant to neutralize the effects.


LAPTOPS

Laptops are harmful as the hard drive’s motor and it’s active components radiate negatively. Place a disc on the computer beside the keyboard.


WI-FI/MODEMS

In order to transform the radiations from your own Wi-Fi hot spot, transmitter or Modem. Place a plate of Shungite underneath it.

 

CORDLESS PHONES

The base of the cordless phone emits harmful bioenergetic waves that extend out all around it to a distance of about 10m. It is essential to protect the base or choose a non portable phone. Being protected by a Shungite Plate at the base the handsets then automatically balance their transmissions.


ELECTRICAL PANELS

The damaging influence of around 50Hz alternating current emitted by electrical instillations can be corrected by using a Shungite Pyramid on the Power Box.

Studio or small apartment 5cm pyramid

House 7cm pyramid

The larger the electric instillation the larger the pyramid needs to be. 


MICROWAVES

Personally I have not owned a microwave for 8 years. Protecting yourself externally from the unit itself is really pointless. The device destroys and irradiates the food you are ingesting. Consuming microwaved food causes us to lose 40-60% of our life force energy. If it makes you feel better place a Shungite plate on the front of the device.


HIGH–TENSION LINES

The best thing to do would to move elsewhere

Wear a Shungite Pendant

Place a Pyramid or Sphere in each room 6-10 cm this would be the same for neighbouring Wi-Fi emissions.


LIVING ROOMS

Place a large Pyramid 7-10cm  or a Large Sphere 7 -10cm in your living room area to harmonise & create a peaceful sanctuary.


BEDROOMS

A Sphere or Egg will balance and create a peaceful and relaxing energy, whilst eliminating any negative energy within the space.

Harmonisers - Shungite paired with Selenite is a powerful combo which promotes restful sleep, helps with insomnia, nightmares and anxiety. 


FOR CHILDREN

New technologies attract and over stimulate a child’s upper chakras, especially the over use of devices & their games. An over stimulated 6th Chakra can contribute to hyperactivity. The introduction of grounding exercises and Shungite can help balance the chakras.

Wearing a pendant (not every day) & harmonisers in the bedroom – Shungite & Selenite can help them re-balance.


OFFICE

Place a pyramid or sphere on your office desk, size will depend on the area of your desk & available space.

A phone/device holder is excellent for your office or if you sleep with your device on your bedside table this is an effective way to harmonise & reduce the effects of EMF's. Turn your device on its side to insert charger.

SHUNGITE IN THE CAR

The car engine, computer system, electrical system shrink our energy field, we are no longer connected to the Earths energy field. We are stuck in a cage where energy cannot escape or enter.

The effects of long car trips leave us feeling tired and drained.

Place a small shungite pyramid 3-4cm on the dashboard or wear a shungite pendant. 


PLANES

When you exit a plane your 1st Chakra is smaller wearing Shungite helps withstand the energetic disturbances caused by the cabin pressurization.

When you arrive you need to re-connect with the Earth – Shungite helps reactivate this relationship.


GEOBIOLOGY

To “protect oneself from the effect of geopathic stress, neutralisation of the radiation using shungite “energy pyramids” and other absorbing shungite products is recommended. 

Beneficial influence zones for spheres and pyramids placed in a neutral zone

based off the studies by Regina Martino. When they are placed in an area of distrubance the enamation will be reduced in proportion to the intensity of the disturbance.


Whilst the benefits of Shungite have only recently been acknowledged by the Western world & the scientific discovery of fullerines present in Shungite, it is important to remember the people of Karelia, Russia have known & recognised the benefits of Shuingite for centuries, without even knowing what fullerines were!

This mineral formed billions of years ago and archeological research shows numerous ancient settlements in this area as early as 9,000 BCE, throughout time civilisations have been leaving behind petroglyphs & rock paintings dating back four thousand to nine thousand years. The rock carvings at Lake Onega date from the Neolithic era depicting mythological scenes, nature, migration patterns & archeological digs have uncovered sacred sites, labyrinths, sacred stones, burial sites, dating to 6000 BCE.

The healing properties of the 'black rock' & pure waters waters which sprang from it, of the Lake Onega area, were offically mentioned in writing in the reign of Ivan the Terrible & his son Feodor in the 1500's.

Shungite has the remakable ability to purify water and more on that will be in another blog.


Shungite is a Master Healer, a wonderful addition to your health & wellbeing regime.

item.content:encoded:
Shift Crystals

Shift Crystals also known as Growth Interference Crystals look like they have had tiny little saw cuts made through them. This is from thin layers of calcite which have interrupted the growth of the Quartz, it has later dissolved in the pocket before the next phase of the quartz’s growth, leaving it bladed and indented with spaces.

'It literally shifts you into a new space and accelerates spiritual growth, although other stones may be needed to assimilate the changes.


Spiritually, this stone takes you to a place of wild abandon, leaving behind everything that fetters or restricts you, opening to a peak experience of bliss and ultimate creativity. The perfect stone for meditation, manifestation and dreaming up, you need to be prepared to accept whatever it offers, as there is no going back and the effects can be dramatic, traumatic and overwhelming - it frequently, virtually instantaneously shifts you on to your soul path, opens healing potential and clears the evolutionary way forward.

Whatever is outworn, outgrown or no longer serves in your life, at any level, falls away under the influence of this catalytic stone.


When you are ready for such a profound change, meditate with the crystal for 30mins, asking to be shown the way forward. Sleep with it under your pillow (bed in this instance being a cluster), under your chair at work (Most people have wheels on their chairs at work, So don’t roll over it)

Be receptive to signals from the universe and make the choice to respond appropriately.

Psychologically, one of the most profound lessons that a Shift Crystal teaches is that of emotional independence and personal autonomy. It brings about the realisation that you alone are responsible for creating your well being and happiness. Such a sense is an inner state that is not dependent in any external source, including partner or loved one. Only you can maintain it.' [Crystal Bible, Judy Hall]

* Spiritual Growth

item.content:encoded:
Kyanite

Kyanite is excellent for attunement and meditation. It is a tranquilising & powerful transmitter & amplifier of high frequency energies, stimulating psychic abilities & the intuition. 

Kyanite connects to spirit guides & installs compassion. Grounding spiritual vibrations, it brings spiritual integrity and maturation. It aligns all chakras & subtle bodies, clearing the pathways & meridians, restores Qi to the physical body & its organs.

Kyanite faciltates the ascension process by drawing the light body down into the physical realm & connecting the higher mind to the highest frequencies. [Judy Hall]

Kyanite facilitates meditation, the calming, clearing properties can be useful to help shift into the space as its energies are easily accessable, gentle & balanced. It aids accessing the astral planes & connecting with guides.


Keywords:


* Calming

* Tranquility

* Compassion

* Attunement

* Grounding

* Integrity

* Self Expression

* Communication

* Dream Recall & Dream Healing

* Aligns the Chakras & Subtle Bodies

* Clears Meridians

* Restores Qi to the Physical Body

* Opens the Throast Chakra to Speak your Truth

* Blanaces the Masculine/Feminine Energies

* Dispels Energy Blockages


ZODIAC:  Libra, Aries, Taurus

NUMBER: 4



Blue Kyanite

Blue Kyanite encourages you to speak your truth, cutting through fears and blockages. Opening the throat Chakra, this stone encourages self expression and communication.


Black Kyanite


Black Kyanite provides for grounding during the alignment of the chakras & during or after meditation & when used in conjunction with Blue Kyanite the alignment & the grounding are both spontaneous & self-operating. It assists in moving into the between-life state to access & manifest the current soul plan & release all that no longer serves us. It draws out stagnent energy, replenishing it with life-force. Black Kyanite is an effective tool for those who assisting the evolution of the planet, it pulls out pollution from the earth & transmutes it.


Green Kyanite


Green Kyanite has a more expansive, accessible energy than Blue Kyanite because it is a much more personal crystal that works on the level of earth energy & heart consciousness, rather than cosmic.

The heart has been shown to have its own intuitive intelligence. Green Kyanite forms energetic pathways to go within to find your deepest truth, rather than connecting 'out there' to multi-dimensional awareness. It is extremely helpful if you need to discern the truth of a matter or to recognise ulterior motives & hidden adgendas.


Green Kyanite builds bridges so it is a useful crystal to transfer information from the soma or third eye chakras so that the heart can assimulate & act upon it. This crystal can improve emotional balance, health & performance, relieving stress & distress.

As with all Kyanites, green is a high vibration, tranquilising crystal filled with universal love. It makes an excellent focus for meditation & mediating high frequencies.

It is useful for earth healing and it opens up and aligns the Gaia Gateway Chakra. [Judy Hall]



Orange Kyanite


Orange Kyanite is a great stone for stimulating your personal power. Working with it reminds you what gives you pleasure. Taking you inside yourself to re-connect to your own resources rather than going outside for support, it energises your libido & renews passion for life.

Orange Kyanite hookd out other people's energy, especially from the base & sacral chakras. It releases you from the energetic residues of prior sexual encounters & dissolves karmic blocks. [Judy Hall]


﻿

item.title: Platonic Solids - Sacred Geometry
item.description: Sacred Geometry is the basis of creation. They are the underlying, fundamental building blocks of our universe. Quartz is known as the universal crystal as it covers all chakras, works to amplify, and provides power, clarity and strength. Platonic Solids are named after Plato. They are 5 shapes which are used in the study of sacred geometry.
item.content:encoded:
Platonic Solids

Sacred Geometry

'The Basis of Creation'

Sacred Geometry is the basis of creation. They are the underlying, fundamental building blocks of our universe. Quartz is known as the universal crystal as it covers all chakras, works to amplify, and provides power, clarity and strength. Platonic Solids are named after Plato. They are 5 shapes which are used in the study of sacred geometry. Each three dimensional shape has & emits it's own frequency & is associated with one of the elements & a chakra centre.

Work with each shape during meditation, personal healing or holistic treatments to see what information they hold for you.



Cube

Element: Earth

Chakra: Base

Uses: Grounding your energies, Focus, Calm, Removal of physical tension and stress.


Icosahedron

Element: Water

Chakra: Sacral 

Uses: Fluidity and maintaining movement, Emotional understanding, Creativity.


Tetrahedron

Element: Fire

Chakra: Solar Plexus Chakra

Uses: Physical and Spiritual balance, Meditation, Mindfullness, Acceptance of self and Personal Power, all types of Energy work.


Octahedron

Element: Air

Chakra: Heart Chakra

Uses: Love, Understanding, Compassion, Self-Reflection, Spirituality.


Dodecahedron

Element : Universe

Chakra: Third Eye Crown 

Uses:   Connections with the Divine, Higher Awareness, Raise our physical vibrations to connect with oneness and universal energy, Kundalini stimulator.


Additional Shapes

Sphere

Spheres are known for many attributes including the following: Unity of self, Creativity, Knowing no boundaries, Connection with Mother Earth and nature, Perfection, Harmony. No beginning, no end.

﻿

Merkabah / Merkaba

The shape known as a Merkabah is said to provide ascension into other realms and life planes, to connect with all that is and all that was. It is a unity of light, spirit and body said to enable true enlightenment and is historically mentioned across many cultures.

Teachings of the Mer-Ka-Bah by Drunvalo Melchizedek have resonated with many people. He teaches that we all have an inner merkabah , like an interdimensional vehicle of light which can be activated through meditation and practice to connect us with our Higher Self, promoting clear energy flow through our non-physical energy systems for optimal health both spiritually and physically. This inner merkabah is the masculine & feminine energy systems.


View Platonic Solids Sets in Store  

Vibe High my Tribe

Bronzite helps you in descision making, encouraging you to stand up for yourself & to be more assetive.

Use Bronzite with care, it is an amplifier & can exacerbate the effects of ill intent, spells & psychic attacks - the energy bounces between the attacker & the attacked. Use it with Black Tourmaline to protect from this as Black Tourmaline stops the energetic attack & cuts the connection completely & permanetly. [Judy Hall]

It is always best practice to send anything directly to source & not back to the sender as energetically this is what happens & you can & will end up very ill playing low vibe games like that.

item.title: Clear Quartz
item.description: Clear Quartz is the most powerful healing and energy amplifier on the planet because of its unique helical spiral crystalline form.
item.content:encoded:
Clear Quartz

‘ The Power of Energetic Amplification’

Clear Quartz is the most powerful healing and energy amplifier on the planet because of its unique helical spiral crystalline form. Found world wide, it absorbs, stores, releases and regulates energy and is excellent for unblocking it. Holding a quartz crystal in your hand doubles your bio magnetic field.

This crystal works at a vibrational level, it attunes to your frequency, to the specific energy requirements you need for healing or to undertake spiritual work, transforming negativity, amplifying energy & adjusts your vibrational field & raises your consciousness. 

It takes the energy to the most perfect state possible, going back to before the dis-ease set in. It cleanses and enhances the organs and acts as a deep soul cleanser, connecting the physical dimension with the mind.

At a spiritual level this crystal raises energy to the highest possible level, enhances psychic abilities and attuned you to your spiritual purpose.

Containing every colour possible, Clear Quartz works on all levels of being. Storing information like a natural computer these crystals are a spiritual library waiting to be accessed.

Used in meditation it filters out distractions. It is a master healer and can be used for any condition. 

Indgenous Americans refer to Quartz as the 'Brain Cells of Mother Earth'

It holds a dynamic hologram of the soul & universal knowledge. Quartz communicates with all kingdoms, plant, animal, minerals & non-physical advanced lifeforms [Judy Hall]


Quartz has both piezoelectric & pyroelectric properties; the polarity of the Quartz crystal will change when it is either subjected to pressure or heat, as well ad when it is held in the hand - the tip, normallty positive & receiving energy will then change & become negative, thus, emitting energy which will radiate from the tip or from an edge. These properties support the amplification, focusing, storage, transfer, and transformation of energy. [Melody]


There are around 1000 crystal Materials which are piezoelectric, Tourmaline, Topaz, Apatite, Sapphire, Zirconia to name a few.

item.content:encoded:
Dalmation Stone

Dalmation Stone is commonly referred to as Dalmation Jasper, but it is not a Jasper. It is an igneous microcrystalline quartz from Chihuahua, Mexico & is much softer than Jasper.

Dalmation Stone opens the Base & Earth Star Chakras reminding us we are spiritual beings on a human journey, imparting a sense of physicality to the soul. It assists in coming to terms with being incarnated. It stimulates your sense of fun & is used as a pick-me-up for energy depletion.


Dalmation Stone speckled black spots were once believed to be Black Tourmaline however research has since discovered it is arfvedsonite.


Arfedsonite  allows you to reconcile difficulties by helping you see things from both sides. It removes energy blockages in the physical & subtle bobies. It opens the Crown Chakra, stimulating journeying, & assists energetic downloads. Helps with transititions, rites of passages of all kinds. It is a stone of Birth-Death-Rebirth.

This is a wonedrful stone for anyone who at times has difficulty wanting to remain on this planet during their awakening process.
